item.title: Need help with adding mosters to my server!
item.dc:creator: @aronscape aronscape
item.description:
@aronscape wrote:

thezx first of we dont talk about rep and second ehre is how u add monsters…

Open up your Autospawn.cfg and Youl see somthing like

npc= 1 1800 2800 0 0 0 0 man

Somthing like that above

The 1 is the id of the npc id 1 is a Man.

1800 2800 are the coordinates u want the man standing,after that are the coordinates u can let your npc walk.

so its very eassy,sorry that this was such little tut but,i Hope it helped you

-AronScape-

Read full topic
